answers.answer: Girl... pick yourself up and get at it.... You can do it... IT takes some of us longer than others... I think it helps cause it makes you want it more.. Feel free to email me if you need to.. ***@****I am here alot but don't post too much... mainly just to help others.. ITs gotten hard to weed through the posts and find the stuff that is addiction.recovery related.. buit I am still here and not going anywhere...I will be thinking of you.. keep fighting..Stephanie

Thank you. I found out friday that my daughter who is 14 has type 1 diabetes. I have got to get off these pills. I mean this poor baby has to take a shot about 7 times a day and I feel like a whimp because of the hold Ultram has on me. She needs me now more than ever and I have to focus
You can do it!! Throw the pills away and don't look back. I am only on day 4 but feel much better.

yeah, i know how you feel.  it's day one for me again.  i was taking about 40-60 mg oxy and hydro mix a day last 6 months with about 2 years of 20mg a day hydro before that and i really wanted to quit last weekend.  ended up having to go to neices birthday party, moving my daughter out of her apartment 75 miles away with me driving.  now i have had my 14 year old neice to watch all week.  back to taking 10mg oxy a day.  it's always something, other people just don't some to understand and at least let you have 2-3 days to just do nothing.  good luck though, i'll be right there with you unless i take more which will probably happen.  tolerance is way down though.   used to take 20mg oxy to feel anything now i take 5mg and feel it heavily...ohh well that's besides the point.  good luck

So good to hear from you - I have thought about you from time to time - and good for you that you are trying yet again. I certainly know how hard it is to get off those damn Ultram. I haven't even succeeded myself, because I had such a hard time for so long when I went c/t, so I stille take the occasional pill just to maintain a feeling of reasonable well-being, not to get high. So I know how hard it is. I have managed to cut back from 12 a day to 2 a day, not even that sometimes, so I am in control of the situation right now, but of course need to get off Ultram altogether.Maybe this is your time, hang in there, and I will definetely be here for you (even if I don't post much anymore, I still read).Take care.Minnie

Welcome back!!! I missed you and am glad you are back and ready to fight this addiction thing again!!You are still so much farther than where you were in the first place.  You can do it!!!  CT or taper, whatever you decide, we are here for youlFeel free to post often about anything on your mind...............it helps to talk about it.tzt

question: I know that you have all heard it from me before but it is the last time from the bottom of my heart I can't keep putting myself through this. C/T today again and I feel crappy already. Chills sweats lathargy you know the drill.....of course it is my fiance's birthday and I have a lot of functions to make it through this weekend....thats always the way isn't it. 11 years on Ultram I can't believe it's been 11 years.
title: day 1 yet again
